label: 柳川調興
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1603-84)  Tsushima retainer and accuser of Sō Yoshinari.  One of the most influential samurai of the Tsushima domain, who also had excellent connections at the court of the Tokugawa in Edo (p. 298). [対馬、宗義成、徳川]
